name: Hissing Acid
effect:
To Discard: Spend 6 Æ.

Power 3: Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If it's a player turn order card, Unleash three times. Otherwise, any player suffers 5 damage.

name: Sky Tremor
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 1: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.

name: Engulfing Madness
effect:
To Discard: Spend 8 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 4 damage.

name: Separate
effect: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. The player with the most expensive prepped spell discards that spell.

name: Marked
effect: Unleash twice. The player with the lowest life suffers 3 damage.

name: Eradicate
effect: Unleash twice. Any player discards their three most expensive cards in hand.

name: Flash Of Decay
effect: Power 2: Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive prepped spell destroys it. If that spell costs 4 Æ or less, or no spell was destroyed, Unleash.

name: Terrify
effect: Unleash three times. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Any player destroys two cards in hand.

name: Ray Of Desolation
effect: Power 1: Unleash twice. The players collectively destroy the two most expensive prepped spells.

name: Thunderous Tempest
effect:
To Discard: Spend 9 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash. If there are two nemesis turn order cards in the turn order discard pile, any player suffers 8 damage. Otherwise, any player suffers 5 damage.

name: Sacrifice
effect: Unleash four times. OR Gravehold suffers 4 damage and any player suffers 4 damage.
